name: Get Accounts
query:
SELECT Id, Name 
FROM Account 
LIMIT 10

name: Get Contacts
query:
SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName
  FROM Contact 
LIMIT 10

name: Get SourceMember (Tooling)
query: SELECT Id, LastModifiedBy.Name, MemberIdOrName, MemberType, MemberName, RevisionNum, RevisionCounter, IsNameObsolete, LastModifiedById, IsNewMember, ChangedBy FROM SourceMember

name: ProfileLayout (Tooling)
query: SELECT LayoutId, Layout.Name, ProfileId, Profile.Name, RecordTypeId, TableEnumOrId FROM ProfileLayout WHERE Profile.Name ='System Administrator'
